findings.title: Improved Contract Construction And Initialization Logic in MintID
findings.description: The constructor of `MintID` contract can be improved by adding `_disableInitializers();` to prevent malicious activity.

findings.title: Trust Issue of Admin Keys
findings.description: In the audited token contracts, there exist a privileged `owner` account that plays important roles in governing and regulating the contract-wide operations.

findings.title: Redundant Code Removal in MintID
findings.description: The `MintID` token contract has unnecessary redundancies that can be safely removed, such as the inherited parent contract `ReentrancyGuardUpgradeable` which is not functionally necessary.
